articles.author: CST Editorial Board
articles.title: After bloody July Fourth weekend, mayor calls for the feds. We hope they're listening. - Chicago Sun-Times
articles.description: We cannot let gun violence become as much of an American tradition on July Fourth as fireworks. Here in Chicago, there were at least 105 people shot — 20 fatally — over the long holiday weekend.
articles.content: The maximum rider capacity on a standard 40-foot CTA bus is 53 passengers. Two buses can fit 106 commuters. There were at least 105 people shot in Chicago 20 of them fatally over the extended July Fo… [+4627 chars]
